short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your customer support with AI. Create custom GPT chatbots that can answer questions about your services in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SiteSpeakAI extension allows you to easily add new pages and URLs to your custom GPT chatbots for training. This will enable your chatbot to answer your visitors questions more accurately based on the content of the pages used in training.

Notes:
To use this extension, you will need to sign up for a SiteSpeakAI account at https://sitespeak.ai to get your API Key and Chatbot ID.
